title: Client issues
body: I was playing a ranked game, got disconnected and couldnt login back. My connection was fine, i checked the server status and stuff. Dunno if was the update before the game or something else. When i was finally able to login the game was over and i lost 21 lp. Doesnt seems fair to me.

replies.body: Sounds like you might have hit a bump in your connection for some reason. I'd make sure you update your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you haven't yet, specifically port forwarding and DNS servers settings to be sure your connection takes a good path to our servers.
